name: Graveyard Escape BETAJam22H
description:
Your Skeleton Crew is escaping the graveyard, avoid the undertaker. Space to jump. Milk to boost your bones.

Jerry, Tom, and Ben, the esteemed members of the infamous Skeleton Crew have dug their way out of their graves, and are trying to make it out of the graveyard to shake their bones.

The graveyard keeper, Mr. Undertaker, does not approve. Drink your milk to boost your bones. Escape the graveyard at any cost.

An entry for BETAs first game jam.

Theme: One Enemy The games will be rated by a panel of judges with three main criteria in mind:
  1. Adherence to the theme
  2. Smoothness of gameplay
  3. Style over graphics
  4. Bonus criteria = Spooky (Since we are in October)
